statements: SELECT * FROM loyalty_programs;
SELECT traveler_name, loyalty_points FROM loyalty_programs WHERE loyalty_points > 100;
SELECT program_id, discount_rate FROM loyalty_programs ORDER BY discount_rate DESC;
SELECT * FROM loyalty_programs WHERE traveler_id = 123456;
SELECT traveler_name, loyalty_points, discount_rate FROM loyalty_programs WHERE loyalty_points > 50 AND discount_rate >= 0.1;
SELECT * FROM loyalty_programs WHERE traveler_id = 100;
SELECT traveler_name, loyalty_points FROM loyalty_programs WHERE loyalty_points > 500 ORDER BY loyalty_points DESC;
SELECT traveler_id, traveler_name, loyalty_points * discount_rate AS discount_amount FROM loyalty_programs WHERE discount_rate > 0.1 ORDER BY discount_amount DESC;
SELECT traveler_id, traveler_name, loyalty_points, discount_rate FROM loyalty_programs WHERE loyalty_points BETWEEN 200 AND 500 AND discount_rate < 0.05;
SELECT traveler_id, traveler_name, loyalty_points, discount_rate FROM loyalty_programs WHERE discount_rate <= 0.1 ORDER BY traveler_name ASC, loyalty_points DESC;
SELECT * FROM frequent_travelers;
SELECT traveler_name, loyalty_points FROM frequent_travelers ORDER BY loyalty_points DESC;
SELECT traveler_id, traveler_name FROM frequent_travelers WHERE loyalty_points > 100;
SELECT * FROM discount_offers ORDER BY discount_amount ASC;
SELECT offer_details FROM discount_offers WHERE discount_amount > 0.5;
SELECT * FROM frequent_travelers ORDER BY traveler_name DESC, loyalty_points ASC;
SELECT traveler_id, traveler_name FROM frequent_travelers WHERE loyalty_points > 1000;
SELECT * FROM frequent_travelers WHERE traveler_id = 3;
SELECT traveler_name, loyalty_points FROM frequent_travelers WHERE loyalty_points > 500 ORDER BY loyalty_points DESC;
SELECT offer_id, discount_amount FROM discount_offers WHERE discount_amount >= 20 ORDER BY discount_amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM frequent_travelers;
SELECT traveler_name, email FROM frequent_travelers ORDER BY traveler_id DESC;
SELECT traveler_name, email, loyalty_points FROM frequent_travelers WHERE loyalty_points > 1000;
SELECT * FROM discount_offers WHERE offer_type = 'flight';
SELECT offer_name, discount_amount FROM discount_offers ORDER BY discount_amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM frequent_travelers WHERE loyalty_points > 100 ORDER BY traveler_name ASC;
SELECT traveler_name, email FROM frequent_travelers WHERE traveler_id = 3;
SELECT offer_name, discount_amount FROM discount_offers WHERE discount_amount >= 20 ORDER BY discount_amount DESC;
SELECT ft.traveler_name, do.offer_name FROM frequent_travelers ft JOIN redeemed_offers ro ON ft.traveler_id = ro.traveler_id JOIN discount_offers do ON ro.offer_id = do.offer_id;

SELECT ft.traveler_name, do.offer_name FROM frequent_travelers ft LEFT JOIN redeemed_offers ro ON ft.traveler_id = ro.traveler_id LEFT JOIN discount_offers do ON ro.offer_id = do.offer_id WHERE ro.redemption_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM Traveler;
SELECT traveler_id, traveler_name FROM Traveler ORDER BY traveler_name DESC;
SELECT program_name, program_discount FROM LoyaltyProgram WHERE program_discount > 50;
SELECT traveler_name, travel_date, travel_destination FROM TravelHistory ORDER BY travel_date ASC;
SELECT traveler_id, discount_amount, discount_date FROM DiscountHistory WHERE discount_amount < 20 ORDER BY discount_amount DESC;
SELECT traveler_name, traveler_email FROM Traveler;
SELECT traveler_name, traveler_email FROM Traveler WHERE traveler_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM TravelHistory ORDER BY travel_date DESC;
SELECT traveler_name, travel_destination FROM Traveler JOIN TravelHistory ON Traveler.traveler_id = TravelHistory.traveler_id WHERE travel_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT program_name, program_discount FROM LoyaltyProgram WHERE program_discount > 0 ORDER BY program_discount DESC;
SELECT * FROM frequent_travelers;
SELECT traveler_id, traveler_name, loyalty_points FROM frequent_travelers ORDER BY loyalty_points DESC;
SELECT traveler_name, membership_level FROM frequent_travelers WHERE loyalty_points > 500;
SELECT * FROM discounted_flights WHERE departure_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT flight_destination, discount_amount FROM discounted_flights WHERE discount_amount > 100 ORDER BY discount_amount ASC;
SELECT traveler_name, loyalty_points FROM frequent_travelers;
SELECT flight_destination, departure_date, discount_amount FROM discounted_flights WHERE discount_amount > 100;
SELECT * FROM loyalty_discounts WHERE expiration_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT membership_level, COUNT(*) FROM frequent_travelers GROUP BY membership_level;
SELECT traveler_name, purchase_date, total_amount FROM frequent_travelers JOIN purchase_history ON frequent_travelers.traveler_id = purchase_history.traveler_id;
